languages.text: "Может быть, ты и фальшивка, но в тебе есть задатки настоящего лидера. Люди идут за тобой, и пусть твои обещания лживы, вдохновлять ты умеешь по-настоящему. Империуму нужны такие люди".

traits.locale_text: "Может быть, ты и фальшивка, но в тебе есть задатки настоящего лидера. Люди идут за тобой, и пусть твои обещания лживы, вдохновлять ты умеешь по-настоящему. Империуму нужны такие люди".

languages.text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."
languages.original_text: "Может быть, ты и фальшивка, но в тебе есть задатки настоящего лидера. Люди идут за тобой, и пусть твои обещания лживы, вдохновлять ты умеешь по-настоящему. Империуму нужны такие люди".

traits.locale_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."
"You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."
"You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."
"You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."
"You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

languages.text: “或许你是个冒牌货，但你拥有真正的领袖的一切品质。人们需要你，尽管你的承诺都是一纸空谈，但你却激发出了真切的勇气。帝国需要你这样的人。”
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: “或许你是个冒牌货，但你拥有真正的领袖的一切品质。人们需要你，尽管你的承诺都是一纸空谈，但你却激发出了真切的勇气。帝国需要你这样的人。”

languages.text: 「お前は嘘つきかもしれないが、人の上に立ち指導する素質がある。人々はお前に従い、虚ろな約束を吐いたとしても、お前が与える勇気は本物だ。帝国はお前のような者が必要だ」
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は嘘つきかもしれないが、人の上に立ち指導する素質がある。人々はお前に従い、虚ろな約束を吐いたとしても、お前が与える勇気は本物だ。帝国はお前のような者が必要だ」

languages.text: «Puede que sea un farsante, pero tiene madera de líder. La gente le sigue y, por vacías que fueran sus promesas, el coraje que inspira es real. El Imperium necesita súbditos como usted».
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que sea un farsante, pero tiene madera de líder. La gente le sigue y, por vacías que fueran sus promesas, el coraje que inspira es real. El Imperium necesita súbditos como usted».

languages.text: « Vous êtes peut-être un imposteur, mais vous avez l'étoffe d'un leader. Les gens vous suivent et, même si vos promesses sont vides, il est indéniable que vous leur donnez du courage. L'Imperium a besoin de gens comme vous. »
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes peut-être un imposteur, mais vous avez l'étoffe d'un leader. Les gens vous suivent et, même si vos promesses sont vides, il est indéniable que vous leur donnez du courage. L'Imperium a besoin de gens comme vous. »

languages.text: "Ihr mögt ein Hochstapler sein, aber Ihr habt echte Führungsqualitäten. Menschen folgen Euch, und trotz Eurer hohlen Versprechungen weckt Ihr in ihnen realen Mut. Das Imperium braucht Leute wie Euch."
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr mögt ein Hochstapler sein, aber Ihr habt echte Führungsqualitäten. Menschen folgen Euch, und trotz Eurer hohlen Versprechungen weckt Ihr in ihnen realen Mut. Das Imperium braucht Leute wie Euch."

languages.text: "Sahtekâr olabilirsin ama sende gerçek lider kumaşı var. İnsanlar seni takip ediyor. Vaatlerin her ne kadar boş olsa da verdiğin ilham ve cesaret gerçek. İmparatorluk'un senin gibi insanlara ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "You may be a fake, but you have the makings of a true leader. People follow you, and, as hollow as your promises are, the courage that you inspire is real. The Imperium needs people like you."

traits.locale_text: "Sahtekâr olabilirsin ama sende gerçek bir lider hamuru var. İnsanlar seni takip ediyor ve vaatlerin her ne kadar boş olsa da, verdiğin ilham ve cesaret gerçek. İmparatorluk'un senin gibi insanlara ihtiyacı var."
